Posted By: Tommy9898 (2/22/2010 11:43:44 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Try him in a deck with [Obsidian Battle-Axe](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Obsidian Battle-Axe) and [Bramblewood Paragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bramblewood Paragon), fill the empty spaces with other warriors and you have a fun deck. The axe gives all your warriors haste and the Paragon pumps them giving them trample in the process. Most players play removal and board sweepers assuming you won't be able to hit them again the next turn, but with an axe in play, you can cast Stonebrow and swing for 8 trampling damage right away.
posts.html:
Try him in a deck with Obsidian Battle-Axe and Bramblewood Paragon, fill the empty spaces with other warriors and you have a fun deck. The axe gives all your warriors haste and the Paragon pumps them giving them trample in the process. Most players play removal and board sweepers assuming you won't be able to hit them again the next turn, but with an axe in play, you can cast Stonebrow and swing for 8 trampling damage right away.
